'''''Mallorn'' 8''' is the eighth issue of the Tolkien Society's journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in [[1974]].

==Contents==

===Editorial===

* Editorial Comment
** By [[Jonathan Simons|Jon S. Simons]]
* Weekend in Oxford
* Dear Diary Page
* Subscription Note

===Notes===

* The Silmarillion: Interpretation and Extrapolation from Available Resources, Part II 
** By Jim Allan
* Annual General Meeting of the Tolkien Society
** By [[Charles Noad|Charles E. Noad]]
* Obituary of J.R.R. Tolkien
** Reprinted from ''The Times''
* The Dunedanic Empires in Middle Earth
** By Peter Burley

===Creative===

* The Grand Competition (crossword puzzle)
** By Janet K. Gibbs
* The Mythbegotten
** By A.D.L. Etkin
* What Elrond Might Have Said to Arwen
** By Helen Smith
